name: Zombie Guillotine
description:
Zombie Guillotine Survive the post-apocalyptic world set 50 years after the great pandemic turning the humanity into flesh-eating zombies.

Defeat zombies, compete with other players, collect guns and weapons while earning tokens.

Fight for survival in the Most thrilling Action-packed post-apocalyptic play-to-earn NFT game of 2021!

Join in our Testnet Event Now!

Our Website : https://zombieguillotine.online

Learn more about Testnet Event : https://zombieguillotine.online/litepaper/testnet_event

Follow us : https://twitter.com/zomGGame

Join our community : https://t.me/zombie_guillotine_chat

For latest news : https://t.me/zombie_guillotine
